bot.cant_dm: I can't execute this command inside DMs!

args.invalid: You did not provide valid arguments.
args.parse: You need to add a [-f= | --flag=] at the beginning of an argument!

command.no_permission: You don't have the permission to do that.

not_attached.id: This ID does not have any image attached.

image.url: The message URL needs to be from the same channel. Don't ask why, I don't know myself.

image.too_big: The input picture is too big!
image.too_wide: The input picture is too wide!
